answers.answer: Niceguy:How could anyone be 'against' something that "increases active gastric mucous"?Revenire:Technically I think Freddy died "with" HCV rather than "of" HCV.Jesse Taylor, on the other hand, died "of" HCV.
Freddy Fender died of lung cancer but he also had Hep C and Diabetes.
